    Product Information

    Brand Sait
    Application Blending, Finishing
    Diameter 1 Inch
    Grit 80
    Width 2 Inch
    Product Type W Shapes for Stock Removal
    RPM 15900
    Shank 1/4 Inch

    Technical Specifications

    Multiple layers of cotton impregnated with abrasive grain and special bonding agents allow for the coolest blending and finishing mounted points
    Special cotton formula will never load on soft non-ferrous metals like aluminum
    Available in two bonding age

    Extra Product Information

  • Latex Bond - finer grit for ultimate finishing For use on: Aluminum, Metal, Stainless

    • Product Information

  • A54MTX: Resin Bond for light removal/blending
  • A80GFX: Latex Bond with finer grit for ultimate finishing
  • Mandrel overhang InchO Inch must always be the lowest possible
  • Maximum speeds given refer to overhang InchO Inch equal to 1/2 Inch.

    • Suggested Application

  • For use on: Aluminum, Metal, Stainless

entry.title: 3M Cubitron 66527 - Cubitron Ii Cut-Off Wheel 66525 T1 6 in x .04 in x 7/8 in 7100098146
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Type 01 Straight Wheels
Price: 4.98

[shortdesc]

3M Cubitron II Cut-Off Wheel, 66527, T1, black, 6 in x 0.05 in x 7/8 in (15.24 cm x 1.27 mm)

  • The 3M™ Cubitron™ II Cut-Off Wheels with 3M Precision Shaped Grain are engineered to cut faster than competitive ceramic products offering significant productivity gains
  • Metalworking professionals value its fast cutting action on heat-sensitive metals and its abrasive cutting wheel efficiency, yielding 2 to 7x more cuts than conventional cut-off wheels in many cases.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Cubitron
    Origin Country Poland
    Product Type Type 01 Straight Wheels

    Extra Product Information

  • Long-lasting without loss of performance, 3M™ Cubitron™ II Cut-Off Wheel efficiently cuts through even the toughest metal giving you better control while operating and over results
  • This rigid, reinforced resin-bonded cut-off wheel features 3M Precision S

    • Product Information

  • Outstanding cutting performance on both mild steel and ultra high strength steel
  • 3M™ Cubitron™ II cuts 30% faster and lasts 2x longer than conventional ceramic abrasives
  • Precision Shaped Grain (PSG) technology employs microreplication for extremely uniform abrasive
  • Triangular Precision Shaped Grains are super-sharp and cut exceptionally fast

    • Suggested Application

  • For grinding applications on stainless and mild steel
    		•

entry.title: Norton 23000 - Vitrified Bond Mounted Points A Shapes 32A36-Tvbem 1X2-3/4 N4 1/4X1-1/2 61463623000
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norton
Type: A-shape Mounted Points
Price: 8.70

[shortdesc]
  • A mounted wheel is a small grinding wheel permanently fastened to its own spindle
  • They are used is a multitude of operations in almost every industry and on a variety of machines
  • Extensively used in tool and die shops, aerospace and foundries for removing parting lines, deburring, and finishing
  • Mounted wheels come in an extensive numbers of shapes, grit sizes and bond types to satisfy all of these applications.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Norton
    Grit 36
    Product Type A-shape Mounted Points

    Product Information

  • Sharp versatile aluminum oxide grain
  • Free cutting on a wide variety of materials
  • Sharp monocrystalline grain resists burn
  • Better choice, with excellent form-holding compared to more friable white aluminum oxides
    		•
